pages.text: Forged in the $(blood)Hellfire Forge$() using healing and purifying components. Milk, golden apples, and honey combine to create a powerful restorative essence.

A reagent infused with restorative essence and healing power. This catalyst can be combined with an $(item)Imbued Slate$() in an Alchemy Array to create the $(l:animus:sigil_remedium)Sigil: Remedium$().

pages.title: Healing Through Blood
pages.text: Blood magic is not solely a path of destruction. This reagent embodies the healing properties of blood - its ability to mend wounds and cure ailments. The resulting sigil channels life force itself to restore and protect.
